name: solit
description: A Selection of Modified Internal and External Modules for Cost-Efficient Smart Contract Development sourced from @openzeppelin and solmate Libraries
author: tudo <[tudo.dev@gmail.com](mailto:tudo.dev@gmail.com)>

scripts.compile: prettier --write --plugin=prettier-plugin-solidity 'contracts/**/*.sol' && forge build &&  hardhat compile && solhint --config ./.solhint.json -f table ./contracts/**/*.sol
scripts.plugin:storage-layout: hardhat check > logs/storage.txt && hardhat generate-storage-layout --source logs/storage.txt
scripts.plugin:storage-layout-table: hardhat check > logs/storage.txt && hardhat generate-storage-layout-table --source logs/storage.txt
